.. _citing:

Citing pyCATHY
===============

.. note:: If you use the pyCATHY code for you work, please cite this paper as: 

   M. Camporese, C. Paniconi, M. Putti, and S. Orlandini. Surface-subsurface flow modeling with path-based runoff routing, boundary condition-based coupling, and assimilation of multisource observation data. Water Resources Research
